channel.title: [562] Items?
channel.description:
Hello all.
I was looking for something like.. Adding Torva/Korasi to my server.
Is it like adding the models? Or do i need to load another cache? (If yes, how?) I'm allready loading a 602 cache, but Torva/Korasi etc. ain't in there.
For example: Just adding this isn't enough right? (since tuts say just add this.. but the client doesn't have the models?) [code]<itemDefinition> <price> <minPrice>0</minPrice> <maxPrice>0</maxPrice> <normPrice>0</normPrice> </price> <bonus> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>-3</int> <int>-1</int> <int>10</int> <int>11</int> <int>12</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>9</int> <int>1</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonus> <examine>Incredibly sturdy boots for northern winters.</examine> <id>19766</id> <stackable>false</stackable> <name>Fremennik sea boots 4</name> <noted>false</noted> <equipId>5012</equipId> </itemDefinition> [/code]
Thanks.

item.title: [562] Items?
item.dc:creator: @BILF BILF
item.description:
@BILF wrote:

Not just the korasi…

Read full topic

item.title: [562] Items?

item.description:

Tutorial section. There are so many tutorials about adding korasis.

item.title: [562] Items?
item.dc:creator: @BILF BILF
item.description:
@BILF wrote:

Hello all.

I was looking for something like… Adding Torva/Korasi to my server.

Is it like adding the models? Or do i need to load another cache? (If yes, how?)
I’m allready loading a 602 cache, but Torva/Korasi etc. ain’t in there.

For example: Just adding this isn’t enough right? (since tuts say just add this… but the client doesn’t have the models?)

<itemDefinition> <price> <minPrice>0</minPrice> <maxPrice>0</maxPrice> <normPrice>0</normPrice> </price> <bonus> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>-3</int> <int>-1</int> <int>10</int> <int>11</int> <int>12</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> <int>9</int> <int>1</int> <int>0</int> <int>0</int> </bonus> <examine>Incredibly sturdy boots for northern winters.</examine> <id>19766</id> <stackable>false</stackable> <name>Fremennik sea boots 4</name> <noted>false</noted> <equipId>5012</equipId> </itemDefinition>

Thanks.

Read full topic
